snippet: Cornell University has sued the architectural firm founded by the noted architect I.M. Pei, asserting that its design for the expansion of the university’s art museum was flawed.
abstract: Cornell University has sued the architectural firm founded by the noted architect I.M. Pei, asserting that its design for the expansion of the university’s art museum was flawed.

headline.main: Cornell Sues Pei’s Firm Over Museum Expansion Design
headline.print_headline: Cornell Accuses Pei Firm of Defective Designs
